name: NO Gravity (itch) (K4stro)
description:
In this simple game, you have to avoid obstacles that will push you to the spikes by using gravity to control the ball.

This is the first project I submitted to itch.io. So I hope you will try it and give me feedback.
Have fun.

Inputs:

  • W/S or up/down arrow
  • you can use Left Mouse Button

(A downloadable game for Windows, macOS, and Linux and playable in-browser also )

Credits :

  • Soundtrack : YouFulca
  • Fonts : Vladimir Nikolic and Denis Ignatov
